title: Around Forty Boukensha, Densetsu Ni Naru: Ss Rank No Musume Ni Kyouka Saretara Sss Rank Ni Narimashita
alternative_title: The Middle-Aged Adventurer Becomes a Legend: Upgraded to SSS Rank by His SS-Rank Daughter ; アラフォー冒険者、伝説となる　～SSランクの娘に強化されたらSSSランクになりました～ ; Arafo Boukensha, Densetsu ni Naru: SS Rank no Musume ni Kyouka Saretara SSS Rank ni Narimashita
status: The Middle-Aged Adventurer Becomes a Legend: Upgraded to SSS Rank by His SS-Rank Daughter ; アラフォー冒険者、伝説となる　～SSランクの娘に強化されたらSSSランクになりました～ ; Arafo Boukensha, Densetsu ni Naru: SS Rank no Musume ni Kyouka Saretara SSS Rank ni Narimashita
description:
Description :
        A man was given an SSS rank through strengthening magic from the strongest woman in the kingdom?! One day, Wollfe, an average adventurer, is entrusted with a mysterious baby. Through the retirement funds Wolffe has, the girl - Reminia - quickly grows to be a strong heroine and is called to serve in the royal palace as a "woman of valor". Worried about living so far away from her father, Reminia increases all of Wollfe's physical attack, physical defense, magical defense, speed, and auto-recovery stats to MAX. It's then that the success story about a common old man who becomes a legendary adventurer begins!
